original_title: Care Bears: A Belly Badge for Wonderheart
overview: In the magical world of Care-a-Lot, Wonderheart wants to join the Cub Bouts, but it's only for cubs with active Belly Badges. When she resorts to using the wishes from Care 'n Share Charms to fake her powers, it leads to disastrous results.
title: Care Bears: A Belly Badge for Wonderheart
